Defaults for OptimizerMbo

Source: R/mbo_defaults.R
mbo_defaults.Rd

The following defaults are set for OptimizerMbo during optimization if the respective fields are not set during initialization.

  • Optimization Loop: default_loopfun

  • Acquisition Function: default_acqfun

  • Surrogate Learner: default_surrogate

  • Acqfun Optimizer: default_acqoptimizer

See also

Other mbo_defaults: default_acqfun(), default_acqoptimizer(), default_loopfun(), default_surrogate()
